DOC.brief_title: The Comparison Pulse Oximetry , End-tidal Capnometry , Integrated Pulmonary Index ( IPI )
DOC.detailed_description: A simple comparison design use compare pulse SpO2 monitoring respiratory status combination pulse SpO2 monitoring EtCO2 nasal cannula monitoring Integrated Pulmonary Index ( IPI ) . Using combination monitor , subject serve control repeat measurement respiratory rate , SpO2 , EtCO2 IPI 5 second interval . Patients monitor minimum 8 hour admission acute care unit first night . Subjects study convenience sample post-operative in-patients admit 2 East surgery Allenmore Hospital/Multicare Health System 75 bed community facility .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Age great 18 Increased Body Mass Index ( BMI ) > 31 History chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( COPD ) History Sleep Apnea Exclusion criterion : Respiratory failure Isolation requirement Surgical patient admit 2 West ICU
